Make a booking

Glamorous camping is the evolution of camping, intended to give travelers the authentic outdoor experience while providing modern comforts. Glampers enjoy their adventures in nature while enjoying luxuries such as pleasant temperatures and running water, like they would in a regular hotel.

GLAMPING UNDER THE STARS

The Jacobsbay Boutique Glamping & Accommodation specializes in glamping. Outside bars, open entertainment areas, firepits, etc yet having hot showers available (some en suite) and sleeping in comfortable beds.

The A-Frame tents at the back of the property provide a quiet area where visitors can watch the stars light up the night sky. A roaring fire under a starlit African sky gives you a glimpse into the past. Remember, what we see in the night sky took millions of years to travel to our eyes. It might not even be there anymore! 

Stone House

The Stonehouse is one of the most popular units with one double bed and single bed and in-suite bathroom and own private braai area.

Double & Twin

We have 3 double beds with shared bathrooms. Guests have access to the kitchen, braai and entertainment.

Our twin rooms has two single beds in with shared bathrooms.

dormitories

We have 3 dormitories 6 bed, 7 bed and 4 bed dorm.

Guests have access to shared bathrooms, kitchen, braai and entertainment areas.

Tents and Campsites

We have variety A-Frame tents i.e. A-Frame Tent with Ensuite, A-Double Tent ,  Triple Tent and  Twin Tent Tent. Rates calculated upon room selection.

Quaint

Quaint Gypsy Style Caravan, 2 sleeper with King Size Bed, private shower and kitchenette, outdoor braai area with seating and shaded cover. A unique experience!

Fill in the form to secure your booking
Copyright © 2025 Jacobs bay accommodations

Quick Contact

ADDRESS: Plot 307, Jacobs Bay, 7380

PHONE: +27 73 302 5835

Facebook
